name: portfolio
description: ## About This is a professional portfolio website for Bonthu Srihari Babu, a QA Automation Engineer with 3+ years of experience in JavaScript, Node.js, and automation frameworks.

scripts.minify:css: minify dist/styles.css > dist/styles.min.css && mv dist/styles.min.css dist/styles.css
scripts.minify:js: minify dist/script.js > dist/script.min.js && mv dist/script.min.js dist/script.js
scripts.build: npx npm-run-all clean copy minify:css minify:js
